text: Exercise 4-2 : Distances on a database Given a database similar to this one : [L[0]1] [3[0]1] [6]3]3] Which properties does the following distance function have ? euclidg, ((r1, 21,51), (12, 22,92)) = V(21 — 22)* + (11 — 2)° Explain which records are considered equivalent by this distance function, and discuss whether it is sensible in a database and data mining context to have pseudo-metric distance functions. Hint : What could be the nature of attribute r in a database context ?
